mdRecord.dcterms:title: Superintendent Tulane Atkinson, and C. T. Loram eating lunch at an abandoned school.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Davis, Jackson, 1882-1947
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Full view, The two men are smiling as they unwrap their lunch. They sit on the ground, outside the building.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
